title: Wombat poop is cube-shaped!
content: Wombats, native to Australia, have uniquely structured intestines that shape their poop into little cubes . This unusual shape helps the poop stay in place , marking their territory and reducing the chances of it rolling away !

title: In possible peace negotiations: majority of Ukrainians now support ceding territory
content: Ex-NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg said on Tuesday what had probably been discussed behind closed doors for some time: One option for an agreement between Ukraine and Russia could be to hand over the occupied territories to Russia for the time being. Later, at least according to theory, Ukraine will get its land back . Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyj also recently expressed his willingness to place the country, which was occupied in violation of international law, under Russian control until it is regained through diplomatic means.

title: Octopuses have three hearts!
content: Did you know that octopuses have three hearts ? Two pump blood to the gills , while the third pumps it to the rest of the body . Interestingly, when an octopus swims, the heart that delivers blood to the body stops beating , which is one reason why they prefer crawling over swimming—it’s less tiring for them!
